This is the cellar I used to stay, after leaving you I spent a long time here.

I have no choice, the best outcome for me is no outcome... so what difference does it make whether I run away or not, it's just a different way to die.

Let's hide here first, don't worry, it's safe here, even the ground is attacked, the underground should be safe, I promise Himeko to protect you.
先在这里躲藏一会吧，放心，这个地下实验室很安全，就算地面受到律者攻击，这里应该也能维持，既然答应了姬子我就一定会保护你们的安全的。
とにかく、ここに隠れていましょう。安心して、ここの地下は安全よ。仮に地上が律者の攻撃を受けたとしても、ここなら持ちこたえるはず。姫子に約束した以上は、あたくしがあなたたちの安全を守るわ。
어쨌든, 여기 숨는 게 좋겠어. 안심해, 여기 지하는 안전하니까. 설령 지상이 율자의 공격을 받아도 여긴 버틸 수 있을 거야. 히메코에게 약속한 이상, 내가 너희들을 지켜줄게.

First hide here for a while, do not worry, this underground laboratory is very safe, even if the ground is attacked by the Ruler, this place should be able to maintain, since I promised Himeko I will definitely protect your safety.

Anyway, let's hide here. Don't worry, we are safe here in the basement. Even if the ground were to be attacked by the scribes, we should be able to hold out here. As long as I promised Himeko, I will keep you safe.
